<?xml version="1.0"?> <!-- A sample document for the Address.xsd schema. This sample document is used in the docs, see docs/GenerateJava.html. -->
<Address xmlns="http://ws.apache.org/jaxme/examples/misc/address"> <Name> <First>Jane</First> <Middle>Lee</Middle> <Middle>Chris</Middle> <Last>Doe</Last> <Initials>(JD)</Initials> </Name> ... further details omitted for brevity ... </Address>
